dialogue.htmlContent: Knowing that [npc.name(a)] is prowling around this area, you make sure to stay on high alert as you wander down the track that runs alongside Dominion's canal. Just as you suspected, as you cautiously pass a collection of leafy bushes growing on one side of the path, a shadowy figure leaps out, blocking your path! You instantly recognise the [npc.fullRace(true)], and you instinctively jump back into a fighting stance as you expect this encounter to be much the same as the last one.
